channel.title: Need help with my nex!
channel.description: so before i go to nex i gotta go ::frozkey and collect armadyl and bandos piece and then i need to use them on each other normally yu get teleported to another room for the other piece but i dont get teleported help me please!

item.title: Need help with my nex!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“darkpurex, post:3, topic:428203”]no,
when i use piece on other piece i dont get teleported[/quote]

Add a teleport method into your UseItemOnitem packet? Add it where you use them on each other.

Read full topic
